At the risk of sounding ambitious, I'd like to open for the floor to 
accept nominations for scenario themes for the 1st monthly scenario 
contest and submit two ideas:

1)the last battle between King Arthur and Morded

2)the fall of Troy

I'd like to have all the ideas presented by Wednesday, April 30 with a 
vote occuring May 5 - May 9.  Voting would be done by posting to the 
group.  By Sunday May 11, the votes will be counted and the theme will 
be announced.  All people planning on designing a scenario around the 
theme would be need to let the group know by May 18 and the scenario 
files would have to be uploaded into the group folder called "contest 
scenarios" by June 7.  The following week, a poll be conducted to 
determine who designed the best scenario.
